nodes.text: Leisure Garden was a public garden in the Axial Park district of Coronet City, the capital of the planet Corellia. By the time of the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, Leisure Garden featured a number of holostatues that commemorated the heroes of the Jedi Civil War, the companions of the Jedi Knight Revan. During the Battle of Corellia, the Empire deployed a number of artillery pieces in Leisure Garden, and also sabotaged the holostatues. Republic forces eventually destroyed the artillery and restored the holostatues.
